g.text: • Select scopes: polls, predictions, broadcast, clips:edit, chat:read/edit, moderator:manage/read
2. Get Broadcaster ID at streamweasels.com (username → numeric ID)
• Also note your channel name (your username)
• Paste Client ID, Access Token (no 'oauth:'), Broadcaster ID, Channel
• “Send a message to chat: Hello from MCP!” or “Create a poll ‘A, B’ for 60s”
5. One-click Add to Cursor → Approve → Re-run the test
Tip: Actions run as your broadcaster account. Keep your token private; regenerate if needed.
